Title: Relates to exemptions from assessments on residential health care facilities
Summary: Relates to exemptions from assessments on residential health care facilities; provides that for residential health care facility assessment purposes, receipts attributable to services paid for by certain private parties or other private entities shall not be included as gross receipts.
LawCode: Amd ยง2807-d, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to exemptions from assessments on residential health care facilities
